content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my back yard, facing west, looking at the stars.  i saw several prop planes flying with their lights blinking and could hear their engines.  i then noticed a very bright object coming from the west/southwest.  it made no noise and was going in a perfectly straight line to the east/northeast.  it looked like a star, but was even more brilliant the venus.  it was white with spikes of light coming out of it like a car headlight coming at you in the rain? spikey, i guess.  i first thought it was a plane.  the light was as bright as a planes landing lights.  but i noticed it didn't have blinking lights like a plane and was completely silent.  i watched it until it faded from view to the east.  it didn't quit shining, it seemed to fade with the distance and ground lights from the city.  i went from puzzlement to being perplexed, then shock when i realized it wasn't a plane.  it was too low and far to bright to be a satellite. it seemed just a little higher than the other planes in the area, maybe 500 or so feet.
content.summary: Brilliant star-like object travelling west to east, silent, no flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: We were having a fire earlier tonight (april 29th apprx 930pm) in a field and noticed a very bright ball of light quite low to the ground through the tree directly above us. defnitely not a plane due to intensity of brightness, speed, maneuvering, lack of noise.  we moved to the center of the field to see the object without obstruction from the tree, and watched the ball of light move directly over us in a nne direction. it was constantly changing speed (speeding up and slowing down rapidly) and direction (left and right, left and right, and so on) as it moved further away, it slowly dimmed to darkness. ive observed many planes and helicopters at night and know for certain that this was neither. shortly after, we noticed more objects, however, much higher, moving at very high speeds across the sky. i am familiar with what satellites look like but these were changing direction, curving left, curving right. may have been jetliners at cruising altitude but the speed seemed to be about 3-4x the speed of one. an exciting night..
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: A very bright white ball of light moving erraticaly.

content.detailedDescription: Very bright diamond shaped object moving northeast.Slowly dissapeard into the horizon,moving fairly slow.
content.summary: Very bright diamond shaped object moving northeast.

content.detailedDescription:
the shining star. i noticed it as i was working. i was in the woods adjacent to my parents property. i had found a spot to build myself a new clubhouse. as i was a child age thirteen the idea building myself a clubhouse in the woods seemed pretty keen. the year was nineteen seventy eight.
         i was shoveling some sand when i noticed something strange, a star was shining in the daytime. "well look at that' i thought. it was north of my position, shining away, in the middle of the day. it did not seem like a big deal at first. i just wondered how a star would be shining in the daytime. 'oh well' i thought,'no big deal'.
         i went back to working and did not pay attention to the tiny sparkle of light anymore. however; when i looked up about an hour later, it was still there.
         i worked about another hour and decided to go to the house for something to eat. i went to the house, ate and rested for about an hour.
i then went back out to the woods and started to go back to work; but just out of curiosity, is it still there? i looked, yes it was still there. 'now wait a minute' i thought 'i know you are not a star, you have not moved in three hours'. i strained to look at the small sparkle of light. 'well' i thought 'what are you?' i realized that what i was looking at was not a star but some kind of an object that had held its position for hours.
         i know that as long as i worked that day the star like sparkle of light held its position in the sky. i know that it was not a helicopter or balloon because nothing man made can stay in the same spot for hours.
whats more; what can hold its position for hours that sparkles like a star?
         i believe that the bright sparkle pin point of light was a u f o.
because of the objects ability to hold station for hours and its bright sparkle appearance, nothing else fits the description. so to the best of my knowledge, i witnessed a u f o do what no man made flying machine does, sit in one spot for hours.
content.summary: i witnessed a u f o do what no man made flying machine does, sit in one spot for hours

content.detailedDescription: I was a junior in high school by the pool near the student parking lot. i was 17 at the time in either october or november. i was talking to my mother on the phone because i wanted to go home early due to sickness and i needed her permission to leave. i saw a metallic object in the sky, i had noticed it because the sun was making the object shine noticably. it didn't move nor make sound even though it was pretty far away. for some reason i didn't think anything of it even though i have been heavily interesting in ufo's since a child. i walked to the office and came back to that spot and it was gone except that two black helecopters were right around where i saw it. i was very suspicious because i had read in some stories that sometimes black helecopters arrive at a ufo scene. i am now just reporting this event so it is still somewhat of a blur to me, but thats definitely what i saw.
content.summary: Saw ufo and black helecopters followed

content.detailedDescription:
i was out on my patio, ground floor level, looking to the southwest direction, just looking at the trees and the sky noticing what a clear breezy day it was. i saw the usual birds, and a few bugs or insects flying about through the air, still looking towards sw direction. out of the corner of my eye, towards a westerly direction, i saw a large, squarish, bright red object floating silently in the sky. my first though was a section of a large inflatable mattress used in a kids blow-up type jumping thing had escaped and blown into the air. or i thought maybe a large promotional type inflatable had escaped. then i realized, "how could that fly so high into the air?" then i realized i was looking at something very odd, completely silent, turning slightly towards me as if the front was lowering and the back was coming up. i would estimate 15-25 feet square with triangles, very long, hang from the sides at both ends. it was longer than wider, with a very geometric design. seemed to have 4 large panels on top and bottom, slightly angled towards the middle. it was strange how it seemed to move against the wind, and be very big and heavy, rotating on a interesting axis.
     i  suddenly seemed to grasp that i was looking at no balloon, how could a blow up mattress fly up there? the thing i am talking about is where at a childs party or at a carnival there are those inflatable castle looking things, kids take there shoes off and jump around in? that is what i first thought it was. then i realized it was not a what it seemed. i guess i thought that because what else could be flying through the air?  
     i have drawn several sketches. this is interesting also. afterwards, within 10 minutes i witnessed an orb type thing moving through the sky. i watched it for about 40 seconds as it flew ne to sw. about 10 minutes later, another appeared. i took 5 photos, which would look like points of light in the sky, thats all. i saw three round, orb type things in total after the initial sighting of the flying upsidedown "w" thing. all looked similar, high up, silent, either whitish gray or silver. the one definitely had a pattern of bright white light at a point then fade to almost nothing and repeat over and over. one was moving very quickly north to south, at what appeared to be cloud height. the camera i used was just a disposable that i bought at the 99 cent store, so they are not digital photos. it will be interesting to at least see if the point of light would show up. i feel very sure this(the orbs of light) was not an airplane because i was comparing it to other objects in the sky, which i could point out as definitely being a bird or a plane. these were not that. anyway...I am baffled but i did see or experience something large red squarish with wings hanging down(?) silently hovering 200ft off the ground. and 3 "orbs" within the next 30 minutes. if the photos show anything really cool i will share them. peace!!!!
content.summary: A solid brighrt red squarish with wings hoovering silently about 200ft up

content.detailedDescription:
(from e-mail sent to margie kay on 4/29/2010) 

i was getting ready for bed last night when i noticed a white light outside that shouldn't have been there.  i went to the back door and looked out and there was a large disc shaped craft that looked like it ws about 50 feet in diameter floating about 30 feet above my fence, which is 125 yards from my house.  the light was coming out from the bottom of the craft, and lit up the ground and fence underneath it very brightly.  i called my wife, who was in the shower, to come quick to look and she saw it, too. it just stayed there for a while, then took off very fast and was gone in a couple of seconds.  we were both too scared to do anything -even to get the camera.  i don't know why i didn't get the camera. i was going to call the police to make a report but my wife said they'd just think we were crazy, so i didn't call them.  i got on the internet today and found this site to make a report.  if anyone else saw this i'd like to know about it.  but don't use my name or address in anything - i don't want anyone to find out about this.  i just wanted to tell someone in case you can do anything. i looked at the ground this morning where the light was shining on it but didn't see anything. this is just so weird - i have never seen anything like it and don't want to again. i hope they don't come back.  they were obviously not ours - the craft moved way too fast.
content.summary: Disc hoovered over field for several minutes then took off

content.detailedDescription: I was on the deck looking to the stars when i saw what i thought at first to be a balloon.  i noticed it was dimly lit and was travelling in a straight line. it went out of my view for 1/2 second and then i noticed it seemed a lot higher up than i originally though and seemed to be travelling at a fast speed. i watched it until it was out of sight. i would say about 10-12 seconds altogether.
content.summary: Round balloon like shape flying overhead

content.detailedDescription: On 04/27/10 the pensacola news journal stated the space station would be visable at 849pm. on that night it was clear with no clouds and full moon and the station would be traveling from southwest to northeast. as my girlfriend and i stood in my backyard looking southwestern we saw the space station and observed an object traveling with it at the same speed stopped then turned south for 10 seconds then disappeard. the object was bronze triangular shaped with no lights. neither of us could identify it and i emailed. nasa with negative results.
content.summary: Bronze colored triangular shaped fast and no lights

content.detailedDescription:
My two cousins and i were playing in the alley at my grandmother's house in the summer of 1982.  i was 7.  my cousins were 8 and 12.  i noticed a shimmer in the sky at an unknown height.  we stared at it for about 20 seconds wondering out loud what it was.  it disappeared and simultaneously re-appeared directly in front of us at eye level within reach (about 1 ft. away).  

it was a typical flying saucer about 3 inches in diameter!  it had rows of windows just above the midline and there were beings inside.  i cannot describe the beings as i have no recollection of what they looked like.  i only remember (very vividly) that they were making eye contact with me.  i was not scared.  i was in awe.  it just disappeared without a trace.  my cousins and i talked about it briefly but we didn't really discuss it after that until about 1995 when i brought it up.  my cousin who was 8 at the time doesn't remember it at all.  my cousin (his sister) who was 12 remembers it clearly.

i have been looking for years for a story of a similar encounter, but have yet to find one.
content.summary: A tiny prototypical flying saucer appeared in the sky then instantly moved to a hover 1 ft. in front of us

content.detailedDescription:
Having a smoke in the backyard and enjoying a full moon between 8:15pm-8:30pm. i was looking north in the sky when what appeared to be a star that was bright but way out in the distance began to twinkle and seemed to move directly towards me at great speed and increasing in size. it looked just like a big white bright twinkling star or planet but like i said this thing seemed to zoom in from out of the sky and when it was about 1000 feet or so off the ground it seemed to fall out of the sky straight down about 100 ft or so and disintergrate like a shooting star. just as it vanished it re-appeared from same point it vanished and moved up but at an angle and dropped out of the sky and disintergrated again same as first time. this happened once more and then it never came back. timeline for event was about a minute long. 

within 5 minutes of the sighting i spotted a fast approaching helo that flew right to the spot i saw the object, hovered shortly before leaving same direction it came from. shortly after the helo left 3 loud aircraft flew over side by side at high altitude. sounded like airliners, i could see their anti-collinsion lights but couldnt tell if they were fighters or airliners from sound alone or lights.....

windy, full moon, clear night sky
content.summary: Star like object zoomed in from a distance

content.detailedDescription: Went for a walk outside with my girlfriend, around 9 -10 pm happend to look at the stars and saw two stars very brite, all of a sudden, one of them started to move a lil slowere than airplane speed, i could rule out airplane bcit was going so slow, and it was cloudy so its altitude low and it never went into a cloud, nore did it have red and green marker lights. so my first thought was that it was a falling star, it just slowly traveld over our heads in a north west direction, i live on the the corner of ********* and ******* rd, it seemed to be headed for ft. myers.
content.summary: Looked like a brite star that was moving slowly across the sky to the n w

content.detailedDescription:
Walked outside at 10:23 pm, starry night with low spotty clouds.  looked southwest just above horizon and saw what appeared at first to be a star.  then i realized it was moving what seemed like toward me and then thought it must be an airplane.  but as it moved it wasn't moving toward me but it was moving upward.  i didn't see any red or green lights that would resemble an airplane.  as it moved up it seemed to accelerate until the brightness slowly started to fade and then it became faint as it seemed to move into space above me.  from there i could kind of track it for just a bit and it reminded me of a faint satellite while it was up that high, then it was gone.

weird.  the funny thing was that i spotted something in almost the exact same location about two weeks ago, but it was quite different and brighter.

the first sighting was just about 10:30 pm on a clear and cold evening.   as i walked outside to get something out of my car and i looked soutwest i noticed a very bright starry looking object just above the tree line that seemed far off.  at first i thought it must be a planet or bright star, but it was twinkling red, green, and blue lights.  the more i looked the more it seemed like it was pulsating/twinkling almost looked like it was communicating with something or someone the way it would twinkle.  it was stationary at first but after a few minutes it started to move north, and then ascend slightly.  then it moved steadily northwest until it went behind trees and i couldn't keep visual contact.  my wife witnessed this event also.
content.summary: Looked like star but moved slowly at first then accelerated straight up and out of sight

content.detailedDescription:
I live in the vicinity of woodstock, new york and have a mostly clear line of sight from the north north-east towards the berkshires in the north-east, all the way to the south-west, inclusive of mohonk mountain preserve, where the lights of the mohonk mountain house are clearly visible most nights, with parts of tivoli, annandale-on-hudson, kingston, rhinecliff, rhinebeck, and saugerties clearly visible by day and night. so in principle much of what i describe could have been observed from those locations. 

for skygazing this  is an exceptionally busy place, on the side of the catskill escarpment, directly beneath the main approaches for military and commercial aircraft to stewart int'l airport, 30 miles to the south behind mohonk. i can also observe aircraft ascending from descending towards albany intl. airport, have on occasion observed air traffic associated with regional airports in kingston, rhinebeck and red hook. at higher altitude there are regular flights (but especially between 5-8:00am, and 4-9:00pm) headed north and south, presumably to and from saratoga, plattsburg, montreal, and the ny metropolitan airports. those lanes follow the hudson river closely. still higher-altitude lanes from points further south are superimposed on the same lanes that serve stewart int'l. there are high-altitude lanes, and regular flights to be observed around dusk, headed west from massachussetts, and east towards massachussetts. smaller craft bound for the regional airports here and beyond tend to fly on the intermediate points of the compass. and then there are the anomalous craft -- those also fly from every which direction, usually at intermediate altitude and between dusk and dawn. my point is, i observe aircraft frequently, and have done so (with increasing interest) for 12 years from this location. on 9/11 i stood outside and listened perplexedly to a full-throttle jetliner race south over the hudson river, 10 miles to the east, invisible behind morning fog. i can hear amtrack on the dutchess county side of the river, and freight trains daily through saugerties and kingston, etc. in other words know what "loud", "moderate" and "silent" aircraft and automotive engines sound like. anything out of the ordinary is sure to capture my attention here where distant sounds and sights are easily perceived, weather permitting.

in brief, tonight was a full moon so in addition to what seemed an exceptionally busy time for air traffic around 9:00 pm to 10:30 pm, it wasthe first time i could actually see the outlines of some of the craft i observed with 7x,50 field glasses. i am accustomed to two sorts of (slightly anomalous) craft, visible almost daily: hovering lights around rush hour (presumably helicopters monitoring the ny state thruway traffic), and large silent craft (sometimes visible by day, often with bright headlights which obscure their shape until they approach close by)--which large craft often turn out to be helicopters, of the sleek turbine-propelled variety. these make almost no sound, if any, except for occcasional slight jet engine noise. i observed at least one of these this evening. additionally, due to the moonlight conditions, i can confirm sighting of two triangular-shaped craft. the first of these, visible around 9:30 pm, shone bright headlights in front, two white flashing lights from behind, one or more flashing red lights at wingtip, and no less than four large (and i mean large, maybe 4' in diameter), round, non-flashing lights visible underneath, two white, one red and one green. this lighting arrangement i have seen perhaps a dozen times before, but due to the darkness could not verify the shape of the craft until this evening. the craft in question flew out of the northwest above overlook mountain and headed southeast towards kingston. no less than seven other aircraft were visible in the air at the time, at various  distances and altitudes, and at least two of them -- bright yellowish spots of light, similar in appearance to the "helicopters" i regularly observe above the thruway, except this time one was approximately above woodstock town, the other approximately above the intersection of 212 and county rte. 30 -- turned and headed in the  same direction as the triangular craft when it appeared. the triangular craft was flying at approximately 2500-3000 feet, or 1500-2000 feet above my location, at 200mph+. (in other words, noticeably faster than a cessna 172, with which i am familiar as a passenger as well as ground observer). 

at about this time (9:30) i observed flying west to east towards kingston what loooked to be a triangular craft, flying at 250mph+, marked only by flashing red lights as well as non-flashing red underlighting. i could not be sure of the details as it was several miles to the south.

later, around midnight, i saw a brilliang yellow light approaching slowly northward from the direction of stewart int'l. i observed the light until its proximity caused it to fade, at which point i could see only a dim outline, two red flashing lights (similar to the craft just mentioned), with dim red lighting visible underneath the craft. as it continued northward, it passed slightly to the east of my location, perhaps 2000-3000 feet above (eg 5000' total, or less), and approximately 1/2 - 1 mile to the east. so it was clearly visible through binoculars, and in the moonlight, as a flat, dark gray or black triangular craft. it appeared to pick up speed as it passed by, accelerating to 250mph approximately, making no sound whatsoever. with the exception of the first triangular craft, which made a slight jet-turbine sound as it passed overhead, none of the craft thus far mentioned made any audible sound -- all the more notable for the fact that while i was observing first-mentioned craft at 9:30pm there was other, more easily identifiable traffic in the air including one or two single-engine prop planes, which were audible at a similar or greater distance, even while the first-mentioned triangular craft flew directly overhead at a higher rate of speed, yet silently.

finally, two separate sightings associated with visible aircraft (i.E., in the distance, as bright yellow headlights and/or flashing beacons), but not identifiable as aircraft:

 around 9:30pm, observing a bright yellow light hovering and gradually approaching from the direction of mohonk, i suddenly noticed a very bright, greenish-white light headed towards me from  the same direction (due south) just a bit above eye level, and seeming to move very quickly to my vicinity. within two minutes the light was passing by my observation point, moving slightly irregularly, the east and just a little above (i.E. at about 30 degrees of incline). when i jumped up from my chair to get a better look with binoculars, it seemed to slow down and change course. it drifted by slowly moving with slight irregularlities of speed and direction, and appeared to be very close, perhaps even as close as 50 feet (which would have made it a very small object, the size of a baseball), but it was difficult to judge size and distance because the object was brilliant though (seemingly, even through binoculars) small, and almost featureless. after i observed it for another minute or so (and rapped on the window to alert my wife, as a witness, from the kitchen), the object turned towards the northeast. as soon as it did so, appeared to gain altitude quickly and dimmed from view altogether within thirty seconds. 

a nearly identical object appeared directly overhead, same shape and color, around 12:00 midnight, within two minutes of the appearance of the second triangular craft described above. perhaps because the object was directly overhead (not to the east, in front of the moon, as was the first greenish-white sphere), it was possible to observe atmospheric effects around the object as it passed over my house (in an arc, from the south east towards the north north-east) which made the object appear to be relatively distant, perhaps 1000 feet above, perhaps as high as 5000 feet -- but like the other sphere, this sphere appeared to slow down when i jumped up from my chair, in order to keep it in view of my binoculars. this (apparent) reaction to my movement made both spheres very hard to judge as far as distance, speed and size were concerned -- by the same token, they gave every impression of being intelligently controlled, whatever they were. 

while i have viewed numerous unidentifiable or strange-looking aircraft from my location in the last six months, at this point none of this is particularly alarming to me personally, much less so to my wife (who could care less what these lights are). however i note that my three cats and dog were noticeably anxious this evening, even though i cannot say whether they actually observed the celestial phenomena themselves. also i have a young child at home who has commented recently on "flashing lights outside" at night -- though i don't know how he could have observed the same craft as i, since he is invariably asleep when i skygaze. evidently there is something strange, and perhaps not altogether "material" in the usual sense going on with all this... 

it may sound odd but one way i am able to anticipate an approaching (anomalous) craft when i am outside, is that the wind almost always picks up before one appears, and sometimes, the wind blows warmer than the ambient temperature on such occasions. if we're dealing advanced propusion technology, perhaps that would be a side effect, or an indication of focused radar ground scanning (i.E., night vision infrared beams?) it may sound strange but i have observed this effect so many times in the last several months that i am quite certain it is no mere coincidence, and not just imagination.
content.summary: Multiple sigtings of bright spherical lights and unusual aircraft

content.detailedDescription: Time was 1245 and it was a cloud covered day. i was driving home on washburn rd heading east of el camo drive when i came to the frist stop sign and looked both ways.  in the distance i belive it was  kind of north towards the mountians when i saw two objects in the distance i belive between mountains to the north and my postion.  at frist i thought it was planes coming out of neils air force base to the east of where i was but something was out of place.  i have seen alot of milarty airplanes in my day flying over my place in north las vegas becuase i live on the flight path to the testing range to the north of neils air force base.  my father was also a b-52 nav and when i was younger taught me how to id alot of planes.    these objects didnt look like a plane there is no way it could have been a plane.  these objects  look about 4inches across and 1/2 an inch thick from my postion.  it almost look like someone put a black squigly line in the air like if you where to put one on paper.  they where close to each other almost flying in a wingman state. they where motionless in the sky for almost 5 mins as i was driving down the road then out of no where the took off at speeds i could never thought possable by normal planes over the mountains to the north out of my sight. the whole episode put me in a very creep out state of mind.     -neo
content.summary: Black squigly lines of north las vegas.

finally, two separate sightings associated with visible aircraft (i.E., in the distance, as bright yellow headlights and/or flashing beacons), but not identifiable as aircraft:

 around 9:30pm, observing a bright yellow light hovering and gradually approaching from the direction of mohonk, i suddenly noticed a very bright, greenish-white light headed towards me from  the same direction (due south) just a bit above eye level, and seeming to move very quickly to my vicinity. within two minutes the light was passing by my observation point, moving slightly irregularly, the east and just a little above (i.E. at about 30 degrees of incline). when i jumped up from my chair to get a better look with binoculars, it seemed to slow down and change course. it drifted by slowly moving with slight irregularlities of speed and direction, and appeared to be very close, perhaps even as close as 50 feet (which would have made it a very small object, the size of a baseball), but it was difficult to judge size and distance because the object was brilliant though (seemingly, even through binoculars) small, and almost featureless. after i observed it for another minute or so (and rapped on the window to alert my wife, as a witness, from the kitchen), the object turned towards the northeast. as soon as it did so, appeared to gain altitude quickly and dimmed from view altogether within thirty seconds. 

a nearly identical object appeared directly overhead, same shape and color, around 12:00 midnight, within two minutes of the appearance of the second triangular craft described above. perhaps because the object was directly overhead (not to the east, in front of the moon, as was the first greenish-white sphere), it was possible to observe atmospheric effects around the object as it passed over my house (in an arc, from the south east towards the north north-east) which made the object appear to be relatively distant, perhaps 1000 feet above, perhaps as high as 5000 feet -- but like the other sphere, this sphere appeared to slow down when i jumped up from my chair, in order to keep it in view of my binoculars. this (apparent) reaction to my movement made both spheres very hard to judge as far as distance, speed and size were concerned -- by the same token, they gave every impression of being intelligently controlled, whatever they were. 

while i have viewed numerous unidentifiable or strange-looking aircraft from my location in the last six months, at this point none of this is particularly alarming to me personally, much less so to my wife (who could care less what these lights are). however i note that my three cats and dog were noticeably anxious this evening, even though i cannot say whether they actually observed the celestial phenomena themselves. also i have a young child at home who has commented recently on "flashing lights outside" at night -- though i don't know how he could have observed the same craft as i, since he is invariably asleep when i skygaze. evidently there is something strange, and perhaps not altogether "material" in the usual sense going on with all this... 

it may sound odd but one way i am able to anticipate an approaching (anomalous) craft when i am outside, is that the wind almost always picks up before one appears, and sometimes, the wind blows warmer than the ambient temperature on such occasions. if we're dealing advanced propusion technology, perhaps that would be a side effect, or an indication of focused radar ground scanning (i.E., night vision infrared beams?) it may sound strange but i have observed this effect so many times in the last several months that i am quite certain it is no mere coincidence, and not just imagination.
content.summary: Multiple sigtings of bright spherical lights and unusual aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: Came home from work arriving aprox 10:05pm went to the back patio to smoke a cicarette  it was a full  moon clear skies was staring at the moon a circle object appeared instantly was dumbfounded and amazed i knew it wasnt something i ever seen before i smoke outside afterwork about the same time never seen something that behaved like this no sound then all of sudden another one appeared now they were travelling in pairs i got really excited woke my girl friend out of bed they were headed from south to north towards my directions my girlfriend witnessed it then all of sudden one of them just disappeared while the other one just flew over my neighborhood very slow with no sound stood outside for another 15 min after it left my sight, i heard fast moving aircraft heading the same direction i first saw these things just appeared and one just disappeared was searching the intenet if anyone saw the same in brandon or was there some sort explanation for this...Thanks left name number if anyone has additional info...
content.summary: Slow moving no sound  fireball circle a pair.

content.detailedDescription:
At 8:52pm, i stepped outside our home to let the dogs out prior to sending them to bed for the evening.

moving from the west towards the east, at what i later calculated to be a trajectory of 87 degrees by the compass, i noticed an extremely bright white light.

the light, which was solid white, not flashing or indicating any other sign of aircraft beacons, moved towards me from the west, overhead, and passed to the east in a straight line at incredible speed.  the object was flying above the current cloud cover in this area at this time and was partially hidden from view only sporadically.

the striking elements in viewing the object were as follows:  solid white light with a size of approximately 8-10 times that of normal aircraft in terms of its brightness.  it traveled in a straight line across the entire horizon within approximately 30-45 seconds.  very large, very fast.  the object was far too low to be any form of orbiting satellite, emitted no debris trail, nor did it appear to decrease in altitude throughout the sighting.  after several minutes of listening, there were no aircraft sounds to be heard during a quiet vt evening.

object heading out of sight east towards the southern nh border.
content.summary: Bright white fast moving sphere.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with my binoculars and i was looking at the sky. at 7:46 pm i saw a yellow/goldish colored ufo in the southern horizon behind a pine tree. it was ascending upwards going east. it kept going up and up eastwards across the entire eastern horizon in about a minute and a half. it appeared to be a bit further away than a normal plane. using the binoculars it appeared that it would take something the size of a nickel to cover it. it did not flash at all, there was absolutely no noise, no dogs were barking, there was no plane activity it was very quiet. the ufo had no noise, there was no smoke trail above it or anywhere at all. as i watched the ufo ascending upwards across the entire eastern horizon it started to just go straight towards the north at a steady pace and a steady elevation.It was heading north. as it headed north it started to descend downwards and keep going north. i watched it go downwards until it was obscured by another pine tree, i could still see it though descending downwards until it went below the roof of my house. the entire duration took 3 minutes. from 7:46 until 7:49 or 7:50. once i couldnt see it anymore i went inside immediately and wrote everything i had just seen down on paper and immediately logged on to this site to report it. now im going back out there to see if there is anything more around. its like a hobby for me. it must have been going fast to be that far away and cover that much distance. im not an expert but i would really like to learn. i wish i had the equipment to capture video. i will be trying to get some equipment. there is a lot of activity here, im not very far at all from snowflake where the travis walton abduction happened. it takes about 25 minutes to get to snowflake from where i live.
content.summary: I saw the ufo using my binoculars, i first saw it in the southern horizon behind a pine tree, it was ascending upwards, it was gold/yellow

content.detailedDescription: On the deck letting my dog inside, i first noticed an object incredibly high up in the sky moving very fast-to high for a normal jet or aircraft-it stopped, then flashed as bright as star-the light dimmed and it continued across the sky further up until it disappeared-another object appeared from the opposite direction-stopped-flashed brilliantly then shot off further up into the sky until it disappeared. on a side not my son had come downstairs stating that he saw a "rocket" or something out of his bedroom window earlier, being the parent i told him he just saw a star and that no rockets are in the sky tonight-he is nine.  its times like this i wish i had a video camera with a very large zoom.
content.summary: Two star like spheres across the sky then stopped on a dime  then back across the sky and went out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were in the hot tub star gazing and this object flew over it seemed to be much closer than a satelite it was shaped somewhere between an egg and a jellybean if it was covered in plasma.  this object really really glowed and it wasnt traveling in  a perfectly straight line, ever few seconds it seemed to change direction slightly.

i have seen the shuttle and the space station fly over and it was different.
content.summary: Object moved from south to north  not the usual satelite path,  it was uniquet in that ever few seconds its seemed to waiver to the side.  it moved about a third faster than a satelite.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to have a cigarette and took the occasion to look up at the planet mars.  i seen a bright star like object moving across the night sky coming from the west and traveling east.  the object had the same brightness or slightly brighter than the planet venus.  i know it was not the planet venus because it is no longer visable at this time of night and it was moving. at first viewing i kept an eye on it expecting to see the oncoming of the red and green lights from an airplane which initially i thought this object was.  after viewing it a little longer possibly another 30 seconds, i realized this was no airplane.  i then took the opportunity to call my nephew john downstairs and my friend anna gomez.  after i did this the object was now directly overhead and starting to dim in brightness.  by the time my friend anna gomez was able to view the object it had dimmed in brightness to where it was barely visable.  approximately 20 to 30 seconds after anna came outside, the object disappeared from eyesight caused by its dimming in brightness.  no photos were taken of the object.
content.summary: Star like object traveling from west to east

content.detailedDescription: I was off work, and was doing some shopping.  i pulled into a parking lot and happened to glance the object through my sunroof.  the shape was a bit like a rock, mostly circular, but with details i couldn't make out.  the wind was really gusting as a huge storm was about to hit.  it hung there and was eventually swallowed up by the clouds, which were whipping through the sky.  i watched the object from my car, through the sun roof, in the parking lot of ollie's discount warehouse on pittsburgh street.  it did not re-emerge from the cloud.  i went into the store and felt very anxious, as i could not rationally explain away what i had seen.  i bought binoculars, so that i wouldn't be caught off guard again.  this is the second ufo i've seen since i moved here.  2 years ago, i witnessed an object which was widely reported by others in the local news paper. the object i witnessed was in the night sky, around 11 pm...It was a point of light which arced around jupiter, and shot off straight up, away from our earth.
content.summary: Shaped like a rock, stationary in storm winds, level with the clouds

content.detailedDescription:
I'll try to be brief...

i was driving home from work, it was dark and mildly foggy.  over the highway i saw a strange object making a turn very close to the ground, a crashing plane i thought first.  it went behind some trees about 600 yards ahead of me and i was waiting for fire or smoke or anything that a crashing plane would have but saw nothing.  i'm not used to seeing large aircraft fly this low to the ground so it was confusing me.  it was very clear that there were 5 bright white lights on the underbelly of the plane and one or two flashing lights as well (possible of the 5).  all lights were colored white with no exceptions.  this aircraft goes out of my view.

about 3 miles of driving later an incredibly slow moving plane comes directly over my vehicle on an open stetch of highway before a strip of businesses.  this time i see a direct view under the aircraft.  it has an apparent wing structure across that appears to have the 5 lights i remembered in bright white and perhaps 4 black looking engines that light is emitting around that must shield the lights' source because i can see their sillouhettes very clearly.  time seems to almost slow down as i'm driving about 30mph looking directly up through my drivers window and trying to make sense of what i'm seeing.  a few more miles up the road, about 2 miles from my home, i see a third object in the sky.

this is the object that has brought me to writing on this database tonight.  since this is my 3rd sighting in a short while i slow down to about 10mph with a few cars behind me right on my bumper.  the speed limit is 25mph so i'm afraid to slow any more as it is a very slick night on the roads.  the aircraft i'm watching not only appears to be moving at a crawl, but not moving at all.  i am about 1-200 feet underneath this aircraft and not more then 40 feet away from it's horizontal distance in comparison to my location.  at this point i open my window and gaze in complete awe at what appears to be hovering at 0 speed or movement completely still as i slowly drive under and passed it.  there are not many lights around me so i am getting an extremely clear view of the object.  i start to look for some sort of helicopter like propulsion but it is too rectangular from what i can see to be one of the local black military choppers or any rescue chopper, those would be far too small.  the same 5 lights spread out over the underbelly of the object are bright white and show the same 4 outlines of some sort of engine.  at this point i am trying to see what type of propulsion it is using because it looks like some sort of a hovercraft in the sky.  i can describe the sound quite accurately because it reminds me of a scene from the movie sneakers where the blind man is trying to figure out where the boss had been kidnapped to by playing audio tracks.  the sound the hovercraft was making was identical to tires on a bridge that has that metal grove where pavement has not been laid down upon yet.  it was a lower pitch, like a rather slow moving tire on metal grill.  i wanted to stop at the next clearing but began to get extremely anxious and scared.  if it was a military plane then why were so many of them running exercises in close proximity on a low visibility night so close to the ground?  if it were an alien craft then i know i have no business with it, no question about that.  i drove the last 2 miles home and got out of my car fairly bewildered.  i could hear the droning of the planes on the horizon in a fashion i have never heard at my home before.

walking towards my front door i looked back in the direction of the last sighting and heard a noise growing louder.  i saw through the trees ahead the same 5 lights making a slow turn at the end of my neighborhood and back around towards the direction it came from.  the neighbors lights across the street prevented my cheap cell phone camera from getting a good picture of the 5 lights in the trees.  since then there has been a constant droning and several more passes just outside of my neighborhood by one or more of these planes.  if i decide to drive back out and videotape these aircraft i will post again.  just wanted to document this in case someone else can provide some information on what i just saw.
content.summary: Several strange aircraft slowly moving 1-200ft from ground.  5 bright white lights across width of aircraft.  one was hovering as i drove by at 10mph about 150ft from ground - 40 yards from my location on ground

content.detailedDescription: Was getting ready to pull the curtains to our sliding glass door on the south side of our home when i saw a large, white/blue light, approximately 20 degrees above the horizon in the south was moving very slowly towards the east. it spanned a distance of almost 45+ degrees from south to east. its size was about double that of venus, which has been in the westnorthwestern part of the sky lately. sirus is in the western sky and was also less than half of the size of the bright light. i went outside with a pair of binoculars and immediately brought it into focus. i had no other lights whatsoever and the only thing that could be seen was the bright light itself. being ex-usaf and living near airports all of my life, i'm used to most lights, including landing lights and spotlights on aircraft. this was much brighter and tinged with blue and most importantly, after the light had gone past my direct view of its front, i could still see it as if it was nothing but a bright light from any angle. landing lights on planes usually disappear once the craft has past and spotlights also begin to shade as they've gone past optimum viewing. this was neither of those. it took a good solid 5 mintues to make its way across the sky. there were absolutely no sounds associated with this light, but there was one of the usual commerical jets flying their normal track over the house at their normal altitude. this light seemed to only be between 3000-5000 feet from a guestimate. whether or not this light was an extraterrestrial craft or not, couldn't tell you, but whose ever it was...I'd like to have one :-)this is just my story off the cuff, i have not gone back and made exact measurements of the event. the only thing i didn't think to do was to take a picture, but such are practically useless at night with our digital camera. i was impressed with whatever it was. the direction should have taken it near hendersonville proper as well or somewhat south of it at worse.
content.summary: Very bright white/blue slowly travelling south to east, soundless

content.detailedDescription:
I was in a barbecue outside when i saw a bright, white object near the moon (moon was bright during the daytime). object was bright like venus is at night, and at first i thought it was just an unusually bright star. the object was apparently still for about a minute after i spotted it, then it moved downwards in an arcuate path.  i'm not a trained observer but it seemed to be losing elevation. then the object changed direction, perhaps around 90 degrees, and moved away at a high rate of speed because in a few minutes it disappeared in the distance. i don't think it was a usual flight and i'm not familiar with weather balloons.  i pointed the object out to some friends i was with but they weren't interested in observing it. 

the sun was behind me, so the luminosity could have been a reflection from the sun, but it was so bright, and continued to be bright after it changed position that i think it was self-illuminated.  the light was much brighter than regular plane lights and the object was flying away from me at one point and it was still bright, so i don't think they were the front lights from an airplane.

i am not sure what i saw and this is the first time i ever see something like this.  i was inspired by the sighting and not afraid-- but it was quite far away.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright object at about 60 degrees in the sky, far away, moved in an arc downwards, then moved away at an angle upwards at an oblique angle to initial motion. disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from going for a 5 mile run like i usually do almost every other day.  i started driving up a hill north on route 109 in acton, maine.  once you get to the top of the hill you're on what is called "hubbard ridge."  to the left you can see vast open area. and to the right there are a couple houses a small restaurant/ale room, and large fields separated by some fairly tall trees and behind all the houses are thick woods.  i was driving along when i looked to my right and up slightly and noticed a small airplane flying by and it was low flying.  low enough i could see the white plane in significant detail.  it was a small plane, not a commercial airline.  it started to turn and head south and i passed another house and some trees and i lost sight of the plane.  then as i begin to pass another open field i could regain vision of the almost the same spot i saw the plane.  only to find there was a large silver cigar shaped object just sitting in the sky.  now the sky was relatively clear, with barely any obstruction of cloud cover.  the object was sitting at a higher altitude than the plane but not by a large difference. it was able to be seen clear as day.  there were no other cars around me at the time and it was around noon time.  and this was not the plane i saw before because this craft did not have any wings, was not the same color, or even had a front propeller and was much too long.  then i started to pass more trees and lost sight of the craft for a slight moment.  seconds later when i regained visibility the craft disappeared.  i took a right down a nearby road to see if it moved but it was no where to be found. i scanned the nearby sky carefully to spot it again, unsuccessful.  i came home and was baffled by what i saw and i still am.  i almost didn't even bother to record my sighting. until i decided to google "silver cigar shaped object," yesterday.  the first thing that came up was a similar story told by someone in tuscon, arizona on april 25th 2010.  in similar fashion they saw it moments around the same time they saw a small plane.  but clearly this object was not a plane.  immediately i felt compelled to voice my story that happened within a day apart from this person on the other side of the country.  this is really strange..
content.summary: Silver cigar-shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
I was in austin, texas and saw a triangle shaped object with 3 yellow/whitish round lights on each point in the early morning hours of april 25th. i was sitting outside against a fence smoking a cigarette.  i was looking up at the sky and i remember seeing the stars illuminated behind the object. it was completely silent and hovered above me for a few seconds before i even realized what i was looking at. it was so close i could make out the details of the lights and i could clearly see the triangle shape against the night sky. after the few seconds went by the lights started to rotate in a clockwise direction. i got scared and looked away to see where my boyfriend was and when i looked back it was gone. i immediately ran to find my boyfriend and told him what i saw. the time was between 1 am and 2 am. i was at the travis county expo center in austin, texas. 


i would like to add that i have never felt more scared when i saw the triangle shaped object in the night sky. i have always watched ufo shows and always kept an open mind but until you see it then you can truly believe it. i am not a religious person but it has made me question my personal beliefs. i have been replaying what i saw over and over in my mind and i know what i saw was real. i don't have picture or video evidence but i can draw an exact sketch of what i saw if needed. i have been very distressed since the night it happened and i do not have any reason to lie.
content.summary: Triangle shaped object hovered above me.  it had 3 glowing yellow/whitish round lights which rotated in clockwise direction.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend wanted to take a picture of the light post and when she took it, three lights appeared behind the light post but weren't actually visible to the naked eye. the first thing i thought of when i first saw it was of these three lights just like it i saw when i was a teenager that were moving in the sky but no noise or anything was coming from it and then it just disappeared.
content.summary: It wasn't in the sky but it appeared in the photo.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside and seen a bright light over grand rapids it looked to be about a mile to 2 from me but was lower than stars and was apearing to change colors  it stayed in a very small area for about 35 minutes and then went very slow to the southwest i video taped this event for about 25 minutes or so i went inside to check were the space station was but it was in our sight at 5.30 am in grand rapids and was'nt due back till 10.30 pm on wed. so i track the satilight on my computer and it was still way east of the united states. ive seen the space station before and this apeared to be nothing of the sort and i watched the stars and they could'nt of moved that far i would post the tape but it's on an older tape one and i don't have the resources if you could answer . wether i'm wrong about the space stations placement  i would apreciate a responce . this change alot of diferant colors and sizes and at first sight i'm sure there were two over and under each other . please understand i don't believe in ufo's even though i have seen unexplained things in the sky . but always thought there was am logocal answer . i also ask that this be confidential. due to the fact that my wife and i own a state run buisness.I did'nt feel anything but confused . and the changeong colors and sitting still or moving left to right very slow. o thought it was an jet or airplane or aeromed but it did'nt move and as i taped you can see jet's and airplanes flying bye .
content.summary: It stayed in a small area for about 35 minutes and then went very slow to the south west i have approx 30 minutes of video tape of it
